LanguageData.Cannibalism_Abhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Abhorrent.description: Eating human flesh is a deeply abhorrent and disgusting act.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Acceptable.label: acceptable
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Acceptable.description: Human meat is just meat, like any other.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Disapproved.description: Eating human flesh is an ugly thing to do.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Horrible.description: Eating human flesh is a horrible thing to do.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Preferred.label: preferred
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Preferred.description: To consume human meat is a noble and necessary part of life.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredRavenous.label: required (ravenous)
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredRavenous.description: Man-flesh is morality. To eat a meal without it is unthinkable.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredStrong.label: required (strong)
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredStrong.description: Consuming human flesh is important. It should be in every meal.
